trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown if an error occurs during parsing of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: A exceção gerada se ocorrer um erro durante a análise da linguagem WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException> is generated by the remoting WSDL parser.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException> é gerado pelo analisador remoting WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The WSDL parser is used by the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5), and can also be invoked programmatically using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> class.
trans-unit.target: O analisador WSDL é usado pelo [Soapsuds ferramenta (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)e também podem ser chamados por meio de programação usando o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_EXCEPTION, which has the value 0x80131500.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException> usa o HRESULT COR_E_EXCEPTION, que tem o valor 0x80131500.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException>, see the <xref:System.Exception> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException>, consulte o <xref:System.Exception> construtores.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que mantém os dados de objeto serializados sobre a exceção que está sendo lançada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém informações contextuais sobre a fonte ou o destino.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSParserException" />.
